title: Pet Friendly! Ready To Be Your Home 4th Floor Portable Air Conditioner
map_address: 12736 Lake City Way NE near NE 130th St
posting_body: Look-and-Lease Special: Now offering up to $1000 off your first full month of rent if you apply within 48 hours of touring our community!
12736 Lake City Way NE, Seattle, WA, 98125
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 677 Sq.
Discover your new home at Solara Luxury Apartments in Seattle, WA.
Here you will find a living experience that blends city with serene balance.
Our pet-friendly apartments are located in North Seattle and offer modern one, two, and three-bedroom homes.
Our homes also come equipped with cozy amenities such as private patios, walk-in closets, and more.
We’re focused on our residents’ wants and needs and it shows in our luxurious community and apartment amenities.
We strive to provide a welcoming atmosphere with all the perks and amenities that will make you feel at home.
Call us to apply and schedule a tour today!
Must make 3X the monthly rent to qualify
Northbound on Lake City Way: Solara Apartments will be located on the right hand side of the street.
The leasing office is located on the north end of the community, where you will also find a parking garage.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
